name: Array Factory (enUS)
author: Tomo
description:
Merges multiple global variables and use it as a virtual array. Plugin consists of 2 events. Ones is for setting a value to the specified array index, and the other one is for obtaining a value from a specified array index.
If you are looking for a Japanese localized version, please use Array Factory (jaJP) instead. Be sure to read the documentation for this plugin before use.
